query:
What are the required fields, field types, supporting documents, official submission method, 
                   governing authority, target users, and submission deadlines for the i-539 form? 
                   Include official source URLs and detailed instructions.
answer: The i-539 form requires completion of all fields, including personal information and current status details. Submit via mail or online before expiration. The governing authority is USCIS. Deadlines vary by case.

results.title: I-539, Application to Extend/Change Nonimmigrant Status - USCIS
results.content: Submit your Form I-539 application for an extension or change of status by mail or you can file online before the expiration date as shown

results.title: [PDF] Form I-539, Instructions for Application to Extend/Change ... - USCIS
results.content: Form I-693, Report of Medical Examination and Vaccination Record, (without the vaccination supplement) which is only required for Form I-539 initial filings.

results.title: USCIS Form I-539: Everything You Need to Know - MotaWord
results.content: USCIS Form I-539 is used by nonimmigrants in the United States to request an extension of their stay or a change in their nonimmigrant status.

results.title: Completing Form I-539: Extending or Changing to H-4 Status
results.content: The fields are structured to accommodate US-type addresses; if your address abroad can fit in that format, go ahead and add it here. Addresses

results.title: [PDF] INSTRUCTIONS Instructions for Form I-539 Application to Extend ...
results.content: You must submit an application for extension of stay or change of status before your current authorized stay expires. Even if you are approved

results.title: Filling Out Form I-539 to Extend Nonimmigrant Status - Nolo
results.content: Line-by-line instructions for filling out the Application to Extend/Change Nonimmigrant Status if you need or want to stay in the U.S. longer.

results.title: [PDF] Form-I-539-Change-of-Status-sample.pdf
results.content: Form I-539 is a fillable PDF form. Type the information into the form using a computer. If there are fields that you cannot type into, change the internet

results.title: [PDF] Online Change of Status Form I-539 Filing Guidebook
results.content: These fields have character limits. Enter as much of your name as possible. Utilize the middle name field if your given name exeeds the character limit.

results.title: Completing Form I-539: Changing from H-1B to F-1 or J-1 Status
results.content: These guidelines are specifically intended to assist affiliates of Stanford University in H-1 status seeking a change to F-1 or J-1 status.

results.title: [PDF] Instructions for Supplement A to Form I-539
results.content: You must submit all fees in the exact amounts. Use the following guidelines when you prepare your checks or money orders for the Form I-539 filing fee and.
